This seems to be the first launch of the application.\nWould you like to use a wizard to walk through initial set-up steps now?
Initial set-up includes 3 steps.\nPlease, define your SMS Banking Teller Number, SMS Banking PIN code and add at least one Subscription
Define SMS Banking Teller Phone Number. This is the phone number SMS will be sent to.
Specify SMS Banking PIN code. This is NOT your credit card PIN code. This is PIN code for SMS Banking access.
Add a Subscription (Sub). Sub is an SMS template to be sent to the bank to trigger an action (find out balance, issue a payment, etc.). Tap "Help" button for more details.
Subscription body allows following "wild cards":\n% sign will be replaced by PIN code\n? will be replaced with a parameter value you will provide later when executing a sub
